org.jppf.utils

Class ReflectionUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jppf.utils.ReflectionUtils

  • public class ReflectionUtils
extends Object
    Collection of static utility methods for dealing with reflection-based APIs.

    • Method Detail

      • dumpObject

        public static String dumpObject(Object o,
                String... names)
        Generates a string that displays all return values for all getters of an object. This method uses a new line character a field separator.
        Parameters:
        o - the object whose getter return values are to be dumped into a string.
        names - the names of the attributes to dump. If null or empty, then all attributes that have a getter, except "class", are dumped. This parameter is used as a filter on the attributes to dump and defines the order in which the fields are dumped.
        Returns:
        a string with the classname, hashcode, and the value of each attribute that has a corresponding getter.

      • dumpObject

        public static String dumpObject(Object o,
                String separator,
                boolean displaySimpleClassName,
                boolean displayHashCode,
                String... names)
        Generates a string that displays all return values for all getters of an object.
        Parameters:
        o - the object whose getter return values are to be dumped into a string.
        separator - separator between field values, like a comma or a new line.
        displaySimpleClassName - true to use the object's class simple name, false for the fully qualified name.
        displayHashCode - whether to append '@hashcode_value' to the name of the class.
        names - the names of the attributes to dump. If null or empty, then all attributes that have a getter, except "class", are dumped. This parameter is used as a filter on the attributes to dump and defines the order in which the fields are dumped.
        Returns:
        a string with the classname, hashcode, and the value of each attribute that has a corresponding getter.

      • isGetter

        public static boolean isGetter(Method meth)
        Determines whether a method is a getter (accessor), according to Sun's naming conventions.
        Parameters:
        meth - the method to analyse.
        Returns:
        true if the method is a getter, false otherwise.

      • isSetter

        public static boolean isSetter(Method meth)
        Determines whether a method is a setter (mutator), according to Sun's naming conventions.
        Parameters:
        meth - the method to analyse.
        Returns:
        true if the method is a setter, false otherwise.

      • getGetter

        public static Method getGetter(Class clazz,
               String name)
        Get a getter with a given name from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class enclosing the getter.
        name - the name of the getter to look for.
        Returns:
        a Method object, or null if the class has no getter with the specified name.

      • getSetter

        public static Method getSetter(Class clazz,
               String name)
        Get a setter with a given name from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class enclosing the setter.
        name - the name of the setter to look for.
        Returns:
        a Method object, or null if the class has no setter with the specified name.

      • getGetterForAttribute

        public static Method getGetterForAttribute(Class clazz,
                           String attrName)
        Get a getter corresponding to a specified instance variable name from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class enclosing the instance variable.
        attrName - the name of the instance variable to look for.
        Returns:
        a Method object, or null if the class has no getter for the specified instance variable name.

      • getSetterForAttribute

        public static Method getSetterForAttribute(Class clazz,
                           String attrName)
        Get a setter corresponding to a specified instance variable name from a class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class enclosing the instance variable.
        attrName - the name of the instance variable to look for.
        Returns:
        a Method object, or null if the class has no setter for the specified instance variable name.

      • getAllBeanMethods

        public static Method[] getAllBeanMethods(Class clazz,
                         boolean getters)
        Obtain all the getters or setters of a specified class.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class to get the methods from.
        getters - if true, indicates that the getters should be looked up, otherwise it should be the setters.
        Returns:
        an array of Method instances.

      • deepCopy

        public static Object deepCopy(Object o)
        Perform a deep copy of an object. This method uses reflection to perform the copy through public accessors and mutators (getters and setters).
        Parameters:
        o - the object to copy.
        Returns:
        an object whose state is a copy of that of the input object.

      • getMatchingMethod

        public static Method getMatchingMethod(Class clazz,
                       String name,
                       Object[] args)
        Get the method with the specified name, in the specified declaring class, that matches the number, order and types of the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class in which to look for the method.
        name - the name of the method to look for.
        args - the arguments of the method.
        Returns:
        a matching Method instance, or null if no match could be found.

      • getMatchingConstructor

        public static Constructor getMatchingConstructor(Class clazz,
                                 Object[] args)
        Get the constructor with in the specified declaring class, that matches the number, order and types of the specified arguments.
        Parameters:
        clazz - the class in which to look for the constructor.
        args - the arguments of the method.
        Returns:
        a matching Constructor instance, or null if no match could be found.

      • matchingTypes

        public static boolean matchingTypes(Class<?>[] argTypes,
                    Class<?>[] types)
        Determine whether a set of (possibly null) types loosely matches another set of types.
        Parameters:
        argTypes - the types to match, null values are considered wildcards (matching any type).
        types - the set of types to match.
        Returns:
        true if the methods match, false otherwise.

      • mapPrimitveType

        public static Class mapPrimitveType(Class type)
        Map a primitive type to its corresponding wrapper type.
        Parameters:
        type - a primitive type.
        Returns:
        a Class instance.

      • createTypeArray

        public static Class[] createTypeArray(Object[] args)
        Generate an array of the types of the specified arguments. If the array of arguments is null this method will return an empty array.
        Parameters:
        args - the arguments to get the types from.
        Returns:
        an array of Class instances.

      • getCurrentMethodName

        public static String getCurrentMethodName()
        Get the name of the method that called this one.
        Returns:
        the name of the invoking method as a string.

      • simpleDump

        public static String simpleDump(Object o)
        Returns a string in format simple_class_name@identity_hashcode from the specified object.
        Parameters:
        o - the object to dump.
        Returns:
        a string representing the specified object, or "null" if the object is null.
